title: Chris CrofTrend 8/8: Olivia Newton-John, The Rock, Pim Kardavidson, Hamilton, 'The Next 365 Days', Nicki Minaj
itunes:title: Chris CrofTrend 8/8: Olivia Newton-John, The Rock, Pim Kardavidson, Hamilton, 'The Next 365 Days', Nicki Minaj
description:
In this edition of Chris CrofTrend, Miles and super producer Becca discuss the passing of Olivia Newton-John, who's pet The Rock would be, the Pim Kardavidson uncoupling, the anti-LGBTQ+ performace of 'Hamilton' at a Texas church, the new Netflix erotic thriller 'The Next 365 Days', and Nicki Minaj recieving the Video Vanguard Award!

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
In this edition of Chris CrofTrend, Miles and super producer Becca discuss the passing of Olivia Newton-John, who's pet The Rock would be, the Pim Kardavidson uncoupling, the anti-LGBTQ+ performace of 'Hamilton' at a Texas church, the new Netflix erotic thriller 'The Next 365 Days', and Nicki Minaj recieving the Video Vanguard Award!

itunes:keywords: Olivia Newton-John, Kim Kardashian, Pete Davidson, Hamilton, The Next 365 Days, Nicki Minaj
